idea:
We help our clients acquire complete knowledge and skill in change management and manage people better, and so create enduring value and breakthrough results from turnarounds, reorganizations, and team synergy. MSD India works with many of the India’s MSME (Micro, Small, and Medium Enterprises) to tackle their most important organizational challenges. We help deliver rapid corporate turnarounds; unlock major efficiency gains through restructuring; create substantial new value from System and Team optimization and build enduring competitive advantage through superior talent and leadership.

Three things define our approach: First, we bring analytical intelligence to the science of organization, using facts and benchmarks to scope the opportunity and measure results. Second, every effort to strengthen organizations is integrated with business imperatives: executing strategy, improving operations , meeting customer needs. Third, we focus not just on short-term results, but on building organizational health—the capabilities and qualities that underpin sustained performance.

Through our core offerings, our network of consultants and experts helps leaders tackle four main organizational challenges:

Designing organizations for high performance

Managing major change with reference to proven standards

Competing through talent and world class LOB's and Teams

Realizing maximum performance through effective systems in place.
name: Hemant Mishra

idea:
Energy and Environment are popular themes of the new millennium because both are closely interlinked

Energy is an irreplaceable part of our life and it is highly correlated with the environment.

GreenShift Energy's aim is to develop robust technologies for various waste streams.

GreenShift Energy Pvt. Ltd. considers that waste processing is a multimodal operation. We analyse a waste stream to identify deftly separable components that can be valorised with least environmental impact.

We believe:

Waste is failure of imagination.

Nothing is waste and everything is a resource.

At the end of product life, everything needs to go back to where it came from.

GreenShift Energy Pvt. Ltd. is jointly working with Institute of Chemical Technology (ICT), Indian Oil Campus, Bhubaneshwar for development of novel technologies in Waste to Wealth domain.

We have worked in various projects involving Government corporations to provide them with end-to-end solutions and also consultancy in Waste to Energy vertical. Our major partnership includes that with Municipal Corporation of Greater Mumbai and Thane Municipal Corporations. In the past 2 years, we have also successfully developed machines for Plastic Waste recycling and UVC based Disinfection products.
name: GREENSHIFT ENERGY PRIVATE LIMITED
